sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' import Head from 'next/head' import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch' class EditPost extends Component { state = { title: '', author: '', category_name: '', body_post: '', status_post: '', created_at: '', update_at: '' } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const posts = { title: this.state.title, author: this.state.author, category_name: this.state.category_name, body_post: this.state.body_post, status_post: this.state.status_post, created_at: this.state.created_at, update_at: this.state.update_at }; axios.put('http://localhost:3004/jsonusers',posts) .then(res => { console.log(res); console.log(res.data); }) } render (props) { return ( <> {/* Favicon */} {/* Title Page */} View Post — Stisla {/* General CSS Files */} {/* CSS Libraries */} {/* Template CSS */} {/* Start GA */}
